Package aka.src

Class Street

java.lang.Object
aka.src.Street
public class Street
extends java.lang.Object
City planning software that will be used for designing a small one street town In this software user can: -add new buildings to the street -delete existing buildings on the street -list the buildings in the street -display playground ratio in the street -display the skyline silhoutte of the street

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Street()
    Default constructor
    Street​(int l)
    Constructor

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void add​(Building bui, java.lang.String side)
    add method adds a new building to the street First it checks the location, if it is out of bounds of the street it does not add the building Then it checks if the location is empty for the side parameter "Front" or "front" and "Back" or "back" is acceptable
    void delete​(int startingPoint, java.lang.String side)
    Another delete method.
    void delete​(Building bui)
    Deletes a building on the street.
    void displaySkylineSilhouette()
    displays the skyline silhouette of the street
    boolean equals​(java.lang.Object o)
    Overriden equals method, returns true if the object o is the same as this.
    void listBuildings()
    Prints buildings as a list.
    void menu()
    menu for an interactive system
    int numberOfPlaygrounds()  
    double playgroundRatio()
    calculates the ratio of length of playgrounds on the street
    java.lang.String toString()
    Overriden toString method, returns the list of the buildings in the street
    int totalLengthHouse()  
    int totalLengthMarket()  
    int totalLengthOffice()  
    int totalRemainingLandsLengthAtBack()
    Calculates empty areas on the back side of the street
    int totalRemainingLandsLengthAtFront()
    Calculates empty areas on the front side of the street

    • Street

      public Street() throws java.lang.Exception
      Default constructor
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception

    • Street

      public Street​(int l) throws java.lang.Exception
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      l - length of the street
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception

  • Method Details

    • add

      public void add​(Building bui, java.lang.String side) throws java.lang.Exception
      add method adds a new building to the street First it checks the location, if it is out of bounds of the street it does not add the building Then it checks if the location is empty for the side parameter "Front" or "front" and "Back" or "back" is acceptable
      Parameters:
      bui - building
      side - side, front or back (String)
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception

    • delete

      public void delete​(Building bui)
      Deletes a building on the street. If two building are same on the street, (Everything is same except the side of the building(front or back)) it deletes both
      Parameters:
      bui - building

    • delete

      public void delete​(int startingPoint, java.lang.String side) throws java.lang.Exception
      Another delete method. Takes starting point and the side of the building on the street, then deletes it.
      Parameters:
      startingPoint - starting location of the building
      side - side of the building on the street (front or back) (String)
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception

    • listBuildings

      public void listBuildings()
      Prints buildings as a list. First, it prints the buildings on the front side of the street, then prints the buildings on the back side of the street.

    • numberOfPlaygrounds

      public int numberOfPlaygrounds()
      Returns:
      number of playgrounds in the street

    • playgroundRatio

      public double playgroundRatio()
      calculates the ratio of length of playgrounds on the street
      Returns:
      a double between 0-1 (0 means there is no playground on the street) (1 means the street is full of playgrounds)

    • totalRemainingLandsLengthAtFront

      public int totalRemainingLandsLengthAtFront()
      Calculates empty areas on the front side of the street
      Returns:
      int, total remaining length of lands on the front side of the street

    • totalRemainingLandsLengthAtBack

      public int totalRemainingLandsLengthAtBack()
      Calculates empty areas on the back side of the street
      Returns:
      int, total remaining length of lands on the back side of the street

    • totalLengthHouse

      public int totalLengthHouse()
      Returns:
      int total length of houses

    • totalLengthMarket

      public int totalLengthMarket()
      Returns:
      int total length of markets

    • totalLengthOffice

      public int totalLengthOffice()
      Returns:
      int total length of offices

    • displaySkylineSilhouette

      public void displaySkylineSilhouette()
      displays the skyline silhouette of the street

    • menu

      public void menu()
      menu for an interactive system

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Overriden toString method, returns the list of the buildings in the street
